name: Tim
description:
This game was made in 2014 when I was 12 and  just learned about GameMaker : Studio. This a single-level game which honestly can be barely called a game. This was a project that I was working on at the time in a course. Probably will never be finished.

  • A and D keys to move left and right respectivaly
  • Space to jump

The goal of the game is to reach the end of the road, poison (green thing on the floor) removes health over time and spikes will almost instantly kill you (takes away 50 hp per tick so if you barely touch it you will be left with 50 hp missing). 

Helpful tip - your collision box is bigger when you are moving left and right and while moving mid-air the character does the moving animation so his collision box is bigger.
